description:
FITS 20-55" TVS

This mount fits most 20-55" TVs sold today. Specifically, it fits TVs with mounting holes as close as 2"x2" or as wide as 16"x16" (in TV terms - VESA 50x50mm to 400x400mm) and up to 115lbs.



14" EXTENSION YET LOW 2.7" PROFILE

The articulating arm extends up to 14" from the wall allowing for side-to-side swivel. The mount collapses to 2.7" from the wall when needed.


FULL MOTION TILT, SWIVEL, AND 

This mount allows for up to 10 degrees of forward tilt and 180 degrees of swivel.


ROTATION ADJUSTMENT.

The APDAM3B allows for 3 degrees of rotation adjustment to ensure a level display. 



TWO STUD INSTALLATION OR MASONRY

The wall plate of the APDAM3B is 17.7" wide allowing for mounting to two standard studs 16" apart.  It also includes the hardware to mount to all types of masonry.



COMPLIMENTARY LEVEL

The APDAM3B ships with a 6" 3-axis Magnetic Bubble Level to ensure level mounting.



10' HIGH SPEED WITH ETHERNET HDMI CABLE

A Twisted Veins 10' High Speed with Ethernet HDMI cable is included, featuring a braided jacket and capable of 3D 1080P signals.



INCLUDES ALL NECESSARY MOUNTING HARDWARE

This mount ships with hardware for both wall and TV mounting.



LIFETIME 100% GUARANTEE

If ANYTHING is wrong with your mount, please contact us. Your mount has a lifetime guarantee.
title: Cheetah Mounts APDAM3B Dual Articulating Arm (14" Extension) TV Wall Mount Bracket for 20-55 inch LCD, LED and Plasma Flat Screen TVs up to VESA 400x400 and 115lbs, with Tilt, Swivel, and Rotation Adjustment, Including a Twisted Veins 10' Braided High Speed with Ethernet HDMI Cable and a 6" 3-Axis Magnetic Bubble Level
